trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when authentication fails for an authentication stream.
trans-unit.target: 当身份验证流的身份验证失败时引发的异常。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream> and <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> classes throw this exception when the client or server cannot be authenticated.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>和<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>客户端或服务器无法进行身份验证时，类将引发此异常。

trans-unit.source: When this exception is thrown, you can retry the authentication with different credentials.
trans-unit.target: 当引发此异常时，你可以重试使用不同的凭据进行身份验证。

trans-unit.source: If you cannot retry the authentication, a <xref:System.Security.Authentication.InvalidCredentialException> is thrown instead of the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果你不能重新进行身份验证，<xref:System.Security.Authentication.InvalidCredentialException>而不是引发<xref:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException" /> class with no message.
trans-unit.target: 不使用任何消息初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException" /> 类的新实例。
此构造函数没有任何影响。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that describes the authentication failure.
trans-unit.target: 描述身份验证失败的 <see cref="T:System.String" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException" /> class with the specified message.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的消息初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property with the text in the `message` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数初始化<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>属性中的文本`message`参数。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> instance that contains the information required to deserialize the new <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> 实例，包含反序列化新的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException" /> 实例所需的信息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException" /> class from the specified instances of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> and <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> classes.
trans-unit.target: 从 <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException" /> 和 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> 类的指定实例初始化 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that describes the authentication failure.
trans-unit.target: 描述身份验证失败的 <see cref="T:System.String" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> that is the cause of the current exception.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException" /> class with the specified message and inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的消息和内部异常初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property with the text in the `message` parameter and initializes the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property with the `innerException` parameter value.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数初始化<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>属性中的文本`message`参数并初始化<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>具有属性`innerException`参数值。
